replies.body: Three things to improve on, firstly the ability to view missions in the app and secondly the ability to change summoner icon, lastly the ability to change your status from online to busy to whatever else and change the mood message and notes of your friends. Im not sure if this is someone possible in the app right now so whenever you update if you could update the patch notes on the respective platforms it would be very helpfull! Thanks for the great work!
